organizerPayoutPolicy.title: Payment flow & refunds (Organizer must read)
organizerPayoutPolicy.lede: Please review this to avoid misunderstandings and disputes.

flow.title: Payment & payout flow
items: Funds go through payment processing and settlement first
Payouts are not instant and follow a review/settlement cycle

refund.title: About refunds
items: Card processing fees are usually not returned (industry standard)
Those fees are borne by the organizer

negative.title: When balance can go negative
items: If refunds or disputes happen before settlement
Your balance may temporarily go negative
Negative amounts are deducted from future revenue

responsibility.title: Responsibility boundaries
items: MORE does not advance or front funds
Refund/dispute costs are borne by the organizer
This prevents abuse and protects serious organizers

why.title: Why these rules exist
items: Protect trust across the platform and other organizers

example.title: Example
example.body: Refund ¥1,000 → participant receives ¥1,000 back. Card fees may not be returned and are borne by the organizer.
